content:
I think it would make sense to add a Debug submeny to the canvas right-click context menu. For now only with one item to display the NMEA log window, but my gut feeling is that we will add things here over time (live log display comes to mind).

Question is just if this submenu always should be enabled and take place, or if we should only display it given some kind of condition.

This is really about #4154

Thoughts?
@Pavel Kalian @Dave Register ^

I think we want a checkbox on Settings->UI that says "Enable Canvas Debug Menu", or so.
Agree the the strangely modal NMEA debug window that we have is, well, strange.

I think we want a checkbox on Settings->UI that says "Enable Canvas Debug Menu

OK, seems like a reasonable approach. Will do.

Agree the the strangely modal NMEA debug window that we have is, well, strange.

With the two fixes in #4154 nothing is actually strange any more. The way to enable the window from Options is a bit awkward, though.
